overview: After waking from a dream in which her husband strangles her, Suzy Johnson (Tina Krause) finds fresh purple bruises on her neck. Thus begins her day-long odyssey of repeated humiliations at the hands of a naughty doctor, timid postman, Siamese twin brothers, and schizophrenic clown!  Will Suzy survive this surreal, fateful day?
title: The Strangled Wife
